results.title: The Muppet Show
results.brief_description: Go behind the curtains as Kermit the Frog and his muppet friends struggle to put on a weekly variety show.

constellations_other.name: Like a puppet on a string
constellations_other.description: From the silly to the sinister, puppets, muppets, dummies and toys on-screen.

results.description: Go behind the curtains as Kermit the Frog and his muppet friends struggle to put on a weekly variety show.

results.title: The Missing Picture
results.creator_credit: Catherine Dussart, Rithy Panh and CNC
results.brief_description: Rithy Panh uses clay figures, archival footage and his narration to recreate the atrocities Cambodia’s Khmer Rouge committed between 1975 and 1979 in an attempt to reclaim Cambodian culture.

constellations_other.name: Lost and found
constellations_other.description: Blossoming from Alice Guy Blaché’s The Cabbage-Patch Fairy, this Constellation explores the impermanence and enduring nature of the moving image.

constellations_other.name: Bophana: cultural memory on film
constellations_other.description: Bophana Audiovisual Resource Center is dedicated to the collection, preservation and presentation of audiovisual material related to Cambodia. Their collection includes archival footage, newsreels, documentaries, feature films, photographs and vinyl records.

results.description: Rithy Panh uses clay figures, archival footage, and his narration to recreate the atrocities Cambodia’s Khmer Rouge committed between 1975 and 1979.
description_for_label: Rithy Panh uses clay figures, archival footage, and his narration to recreate the atrocities Cambodia’s Khmer Rouge committed between 1975 and 1979.

creators_other.name: MEDIA Programme of the European Union

results.title: The Matrix
results.headline_credit: Australia and United States of America, 1999
results.brief_description: Set in the 22nd century, The Matrix tells the story of a computer hacker who joins a group of underground insurgents fighting the vast and powerful computers who now rule the earth.

constellations_other.name: Directions of storytelling
constellations_other.description: Panoramic slides gave magic lanternists the ability to progress narratives by adjusting slides left or right. This movement is emblematic of a panning shot where the camera follows the action the natural way your head moves.

constellations_other.name: Clones, doubles and doppelgangers
constellations_other.description: Multiple characters and doubles materialise in this Constellation inspired by the pioneering special effects of Georges Méliès.

constellations_other.name: Sci-fi miniatures
constellations_other.description: As filmmaking technologies have changed and evolved over the decades, much like audiences, miniatures have endured as one of the most effective film special effects.

results.description: Set in the 22nd century, The Matrix tells the story of a computer hacker who joins a group of underground insurgents fighting the vast and powerful computers who now rule the earth.
description_for_label: Set in the 22nd century, The Matrix tells the story of a computer hacker who joins a group of underground insurgents fighting the vast and powerful computers who now rule the earth.

results.title: The Mask of Zorro
results.brief_description: It has been twenty years since Don Diego de la Vega fought Spanish oppression in Alta California as the legendary romantic hero, Zorro. Having escaped from prison he transforms troubled bandit Alejandro into his successor, in order to foil the plans of the tyrannical Don Rafael Montero who robbed him of his freedom, his wife and his precious daughter.

constellations_other.name: Cinema to superheroes
constellations_other.description: This Magnaphonic Projector and its double were originally used in the Tallangatta cinema in the 1930s.

results.description: It has been twenty years since Don Diego de la Vega fought Spanish oppression in Alta California as the legendary romantic hero, Zorro. Having escaped from prison he transforms troubled bandit Alejandro into his successor, in order to foil the plans of the tyrannical Don Rafael Montero who robbed him of his freedom, his wife and his precious daughter.

results.title: The Mandalorian
results.creator_credit: John Bartnicki, Shawna Trpcic, Doug Chiang, Andrew L. Jones, Fairview Entertainment, Golem Creations and Lucasfilm Ltd.
results.brief_description: After the fall of the Galactic Empire, lawlessness has spread throughout the galaxy. A lone gunfighter makes his way through the outer reaches, earning his keep as a bounty hunter.

constellations_other.name: Innovation, technology and design: Edweard Muybridge
constellations_other.description: A focus on the discovery, inspiration and innovation at the heart of moving image history

constellations_other.name: Action, emotion and videogames
constellations_other.description: More and more, videogames are beginning to favour emotion as much as action, just like their film and TV cousins.

constellations_other.name: Sound and cinema
constellations_other.description: Beginning with one of the first films to be screened at the Palais (a Melbourne cinema with its own outstanding resident orchestra) the constellation celebrates sound as an integral part of the connection between moving image work and audience.

constellations_other.name: Aquaman VFX
constellations_other.description: As well as becoming a global box-office sensation, Aquaman (2018) featured groundbreaking visual effects from Australian companies such as Method Studios.

results.title: The Maltese Falcon
results.brief_description: A private detective takes on a case that involves him with three eccentric criminals, a beautiful liar, and their quest for a priceless statuette.

constellations_other.name: Monsters, murder and mystery
constellations_other.description: Murder and mystery hide in the shadows born from German Expressionism.

results.description: A private detective takes on a case that involves him with three eccentric criminals, a beautiful liar, and their quest for a priceless statuette.

results.title: The Lobster
results.creator_credit: Christos V. Konstantakopoulos, CNC and Haut et Court
results.headline_credit: France, Greece, Ireland, Netherlands and United Kingdom, 2015
results.brief_description: In a dystopian near future, single people, according to the laws of The City, are taken to The Hotel, where they are obliged to find a romantic partner in forty-five days or are transformed into animals and sent off into The Woods.

constellations_other.name: Auteurs and Yorgos Lanthimos
constellations_other.description: Oscar-winner Sandy Powell crafted Abigail's (Emma Stone) costume in The Favourite to represent her ascension in the royal household of Queen Anne by utilising black and white.

results.title: The Lives of Others
results.creator_credit: Florian Henckel von Donnersmarck, Sony Pictures Classics and ARD
results.brief_description: A tragic love story set in East Berlin with the backdrop of an undercover Stasi controlled culture. Stasi captain Wieler is ordered to follow author Dreyman and plunges deeper and deeper into his life until he reaches the threshold of doubting the system.

constellations_other.name: Freedom from surveillance
constellations_other.description: Real world and cinematic authoritarianism and resistance explored through documentaries, Hollywood blockbusters, TV and videogames.

results.creator_credit_for_label: Florian Henckel von Donnersmarck, Sony Pictures Classics and ARD
results.description: A tragic love story set in East Berlin with the backdrop of an undercover Stasi controlled culture. Stasi captain Wieler is ordered to follow author Dreyman and plunges deeper and deeper into his life until he reaches the threshold of doubting the system.

results.title: The Life Aquatic with Steve Zissou
results.brief_description: Renowned oceanographer Steve Zissou has sworn vengeance upon the rare shark that devoured a member of his crew. He and his crew travel the sea, all too often running into pirates and, perhaps more traumatically, various figures from Zissou’s past, including his estranged wife, Eleanor.

constellations_other.name: Deep blue
constellations_other.description: Go deep on an exploration of real world oceans and those rendered by pixels and creatures made from plastics.

results.description: Renowned oceanographer Steve Zissou has sworn vengeance upon the rare shark that devoured a member of his crew. In addition to his regular team, he is joined on his boat by Ned, a man who believes Zissou to be his father, and Jane, a journalist pregnant by a married man. They travel the sea, all too often running into pirates and, perhaps more traumatically, various figures from Zissou’s past, including his estranged wife, Eleanor.
description_for_label: Renowned oceanographer Steve Zissou has sworn vengeance upon the rare shark that devoured a member of his crew. In addition to his regular team, he is joined on his boat by Ned, a man who believes Zissou to be his father, and Jane, a journalist pregnant by a married man. They travel the sea, all too often running into pirates and, perhaps more traumatically, various figures from Zissou’s past, including his estranged wife, Eleanor.

results.title: The Lego Movie
results.creator_credit: LEGO, Village Roadshow Pictures, Warner Bros. Pictures, Warner Bros. Animation, Phil Lord, Christopher Miller and Animal Logic
results.headline_credit: Australia, Denmark and United States of America, 2014
results.brief_description: An ordinary Lego mini-figure, mistakenly thought to be the extraordinary MasterBuilder, is recruited to join a quest to stop an evil Lego tyrant from gluing the universe together.

constellations_other.name: Flipping through the evolution of animation
constellations_other.description: Animation has come a long way since flip books were popular. These optical toys gave the illusion of movement, but now whole films and special effects are animated entirely through computers.

results.creator_credit_for_label: LEGO, Village Roadshow Pictures, Warner Bros. Pictures, Warner Bros. Animation, Phil Lord, Christopher Miller and Animal Logic
results.headline_credit_for_label: Australia, Denmark and United States of America, 2014
results.description:
An ordinary Lego mini-figure, mistakenly thought to be the extraordinary MasterBuilder, is recruited to join a quest to stop an evil Lego tyrant from gluing the universe together.

Phil Lord and Christopher Miller’s 2014 stop-motion animation blockbuster had audience declaring “Everything is awesome!” when it took the world by storm in 2014. Finally bringing the entire, beloved LEGO universe together in a family-friendly romp, it both delighted new viewers and rekindled nostalgia in lovers of the world-famous brick toys. Featuring an all-star cast, including Chris Pratt, Will Ferrell, Elizabeth Banks, Will Arnett, Nick Offerman, Alison Brie, Liam Neeson, and Morgan Freeman, it arrived “at a time when feature animation was looking and feeling mighty anemic…The LEGO Movie shows ‘em how it’s done”, according to The Hollywood Reporter.

It has since spawned a spin-off, The Lego Batman Movie (2017) and a direct sequel, The Lego Movie 2: The Second Part (2019). In our new exhibition, The Story of the Moving Image, we take an in-depth look at character design by Animal Logic.
description_for_label:
An ordinary Lego mini-figure, mistakenly thought to be the extraordinary MasterBuilder, is recruited to join a quest to stop an evil Lego tyrant from gluing the universe together.

Phil Lord and Christopher Miller’s 2014 stop-motion animation blockbuster had audience declaring “Everything is awesome!” when it took the world by storm in 2014. Finally bringing the entire, beloved LEGO universe together in a family-friendly romp, it both delighted new viewers and rekindled nostalgia in lovers of the world-famous brick toys. Featuring an all-star cast, including Chris Pratt, Will Ferrell, Elizabeth Banks, Will Arnett, Nick Offerman, Alison Brie, Liam Neeson, and Morgan Freeman, it arrived “at a time when feature animation was looking and feeling mighty anemic…The LEGO Movie shows ‘em how it’s done”, according to The Hollywood Reporter.

It has since spawned a spin-off, The Lego Batman Movie (2017) and a direct sequel, The Lego Movie 2: The Second Part (2019). In our new exhibition, The Story of the Moving Image, we take an in-depth look at character design by Animal Logic.
